description: Get a single notification by ID. Accepts notification_id (ID!, required, positive integer). Returns Notification with id, title, message, type, priority, isRead, createdAt. Requires authentication. User can only view their own notifications. Raises NotFoundError (404) if notification not found or not owned by current user.
graphql_operation: query GetNotification($notification_id: ID!) { notifications { notification(notification_id: $notification_id) { id title message type priority isRead createdAt } } }
